title: associated helper

title: Thunderbird unable to connect with aol server since Oct. 31
content:
since Oct 31 Thunderbird has not been able to connect to AOL / verizon email server to receive emails. I made no changes. I am able to send email so the connection is good that way.

Message is "login to server pop.verizon.net with user name xxxx failed

Send and receving on phone works ok
